page.title: 15Forestry Commission
page.content: Mr Keiller works with the{Forestry {Commission.}When we went to interview him he gave us a lot of information.He told us that he intended to plant{ {100,000}trees altogether. He would manage this by planting{1000}trees a day with his four workmates. The trees he was planting were{Sitka Spruce.} Behind them were{Japanese Larch} which are insect free. The young trees for planting are two years old. The place where Mr Keiller was planting the{Sitka Spruce}trees was the place where he had planted them{40}years before. The reason he was back planting the{Sitka Spruce}is because the{40}year old trees were blown down last year. A big machine made holes{2 {metres}apart for the men to put the trees in. Mr Keiller has worked with the{Forestry Commission}for more than{ {40}years.
